name: Acceptable Licenses
description: Simple listing of acceptable Free/Open Software and content licenses used by DevProgress projects.

name: Quiz for America
description: Provides a new skill for Alexa-enabled devices (Echo and Tap speakers): interactive voice-driven quizzes, using questions created by the mobile quizzes group.

name: CandidateBot
description: Allows down-ticket candidates to create simple Wikipedia pages.

name: code-of-conduct
description: Document repository outlining our community norms and culture, and how to ensure adherance. Based upon http://18F.gsa.gov

name: csv-simple-search
description: A simple multi keyword search and exporter for .CSV files

name: Debate Bingo
description: Provides a Bingo game to play while watching the Presidential debates using phrases you can expect the candidates to say. Offers three modes: Hillary phrases, Trump phrases, or both.

name: DevProgress.us
description: DevProgress.us Landing Page

name: DevProgress.us Projects
description: DevProgress projects inventory of live and in-progress work of our community.

name: Digital Ads Proxy
description: Network of volunteer proxy nodes, and browser plug-in for tunneling traffic through particular media markets

name: Digital Ads Tracking
description: Slack Channel and content aggregation pipeline for reporting political advertisements.

name: Donation Collection for Travel/Other Expenses
description: Provides people interested in fundraising with instructions on how to travel to battleground states.

name: Drive the Vote
description: Connects drivers and people who need free rides to and from the polls on election day.

name: Google Domain Bridge
description: Provides a bridge to different Google Calendar domains.

name: Google Page Rank
description: Provides a content management system (CMS) on a shared domain for low-resource down-ticket candidates, allowing them to have a web presence with a good Google page rank.

name: HillaryBNB
description: Connects people who want to share their homes with volunteers who need a place to stay.

name: HRC Events Map
description: Helps Hillary supporters find events and volunteer opportunities in their area.

name: HRC FriendFinder
description: Connects Hillary fans in areas of shallow progressive social pools.

name: I'd vote for Hillary, But...
description: Refutes common misconceptions about Hillary.

name: Labor for Hillary
description: Provides a web app showcasing art, state- by-state, in celebration of Labor Day.

name: Latinos for Hillary
description: Provides a web app featuring a Latinos for Hillary YouTube video.

name: Leader Boards for Phone Banks
description: Provides real-time leaderboards to phone bankers to incentivize excellence.

name: Mobile Quizzes
description: Provides quizzes (Topics and Q&A's) for the Hillary 2016 app.

name: Onboarding Wiki
description: Document repository outlining best practices and advice for new members joining DevProgress.

name: OpenOpportunties Instance
description: Matchmaking website for volunteers and projects. Based on Midas project used by UNICEF and 18F.

name: RVertica
description: Native R client for reading from and writing to vertica clusters.

name: SharpUnity for Closed Captions
description: Remixed version of the Official Campaign Font Sharp Unity by Lucas Sharp, optimized for closed captioning for HfA Video Team.

name: TacoTrucks.Party
description: Allows people to sponsor a virtual taco truck and share it with friends. Provides an opportunity to raise money for Hillary, and spotlight the ridiculous things Trump supporters say.

name: Visualize Voter Power
description: Communicates real voter impact on down-ticket races.

name: Women for Hillary
description: Provides a web app featuring a Women for Hillary YouTube video.
